Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.UiController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GuiController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.TurnController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TurnAfterActionController, TurnBeforeActionController, WaitingForTurnController
public abstract class TurnController extends GuiController
Gui abstract controller for the main turn scenes, which will show the playerboard of the current player and the available actions, depending on the turn phase.
